title: C# Level 6 â€” Lists (List<T>) & Dynamic Collections
intro: This level focuses on generic lists in C# for dynamic collections.
points: Understand why dynamic collections are useful compared to fixed-size arrays.
Declare and use List<int> and other generic lists.
Use methods like Add, Remove, Count, and indexing with lists.
Traverse lists using for and foreach loops.
Convert between arrays and lists when needed.
